name: Identify and Shoot
description:
The game "Identify and Shoot" supplements the existing pedagogy of kids learning to identify objects based on their image and classifying them in relevant groups. Similar to other educational gaming tools, the game keeps the kids engaged in the particular learning activity with a sense of fun. It can be used at home or schools to keep the kids engaged in this particular learning activity after a little initial supervision by parents or teachers. It can also be used to test the learning of kids obtained via other traditional mediums. Grown-ups can play the game for pastime and a short bite of relaxation.

The game is priced at $1. However, if one wants to first get a taste of the game before deciding to buy the game, he/she can play the free trial version of the game wherein the player can only identify one object type out of the six object types available in the game. Good luck playing the game!!!
